synopsis:
Yamato, who works at a market that mainly sells organic ingredients, was always smiling and running around day and night.
However, he finds out that he was treated as a "jack of all trades" by people at work, and his heart is shaken. At that time, he was invited by Mirai, a child who picked up coins before, and visits the restaurant "I no Tomo" in the back of Shinjuku Gyoen. Yamato's heart and stomach are satisfied with the warm dishes created by the taciturn owner, Ogami.
However, the resturant's secret suddenly was revealed!

synopsis:
Cheaters get punished—that's how the rules work in most games. However, in the VR MMORPG First Land, exploiting bugs is an open secret, allowing players to gain powerful abilities, expensive items, and level up with ease. Even First Land's top-ranked player, PotatoFistKim, is a bug user who cheated his way to the top. For Jihan, the user behind PotatoFistKim, the stakes are high as he needs to earn money to treat his sick sister. But he's eventually forced to face the consequences of his actions, as he encounters a "bug eater" charged with punishing cheaters...

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Garouden
synopsis: The central plot revolves around a man named Bunshichi Tanba, a dojo-crasher who seeks stronger fighters to prove his strength to himself. While traveling to several schools and challenging the best each had to offer, Tanba came to the FAW (a gym that trains pro-wrestlers) and is pitted against T. Kajiwara. Tanba is defeated and humiliated after realizing that he is not strong enough and disappears for 3 years. Upon his return, he has become nearly unbeatable.

title: The Emperor's Partner
synopsis: After learning that her younger sister sacrificed her own life to save hers, Shinju dies saving a child that reminds her of her lost sibling. On the brink of life and death, she pleads that if there is a god, that he may give her a chance to repay her sister one last time. Her prayers are seemingly answered when she is reborn into a new body in a new world. But before she can find her sister or even attempt to understand what happened, a strange man kisses her in front of hundreds of people.

synopsis:
Yasukata Ueda is the deputy principal of a girls school.
Surrounded by nubile beauties with no way to fulfill his desires,

One day he hears voices coming from the student lounge.

Ueda finds two girls secretly making out.
What! What is this? The ultimate male fantasy and he can't---
wait, he has a smartphone, he can get some video.
Before the girls catch him peeping, he slips away.

Now he has the means to threaten the girls.

He can't blackmail them both at once... but who to choose first?

The pieces of a plan click into place...
and like dominoes, Ueda's moral barriers are falling.

Needless to say, Momo is not too overenthusiastic about this new environment. Most of all, her heart is still feeling uneasy about an unfinished letter left by her father. A letter that contained only two words: "Dear Momo..."

"You are not the real saint; you're nothing but a fake!"

Claude claims that Leticia is the "real saint," but I know from the beginning, she is the woman he has been cheating on me with. So here I am, sharing his wish to cancel our engagement.

Luckily, Helvetica, the personification of that font, appears to guide Marusu into the world of typeface and design. This fun and educational book is the perfect way to learn about typography through the manga personification of various fonts–including Futura, Arial, Optima, and more–and shed light on the design behind the words readers absorb every day

In order to rid the school of its evil spirits and dangerous demons, the Student Council employs the help of seven distinct spirits within the school (each based on common myths and ghost stories in Japanese schools) that can be summoned by the use of seven special badges which Haruto holds.

Killer T Cells are the assassins who destroy virus-infected cells and other foreign contaminants to keep things peaceful inside the body. The Squad Leader of the Killer T Cells is feared by all... but he wants to change his public persona! He wants friends! But he can’t just say so! Solo karaoke, hot pot parties, and smartphones... Cells using modern gadgets in their daily lives unexpectedly result in one hilarious situation after another!

After his death, although she tries her best to keep her spirits up, she starts to frequently make mistakes at work. A drama set in a hospital which tells the story of Keiko who tries to carry on with her life while receiving loving support from those around her.

Jeff, a world-class racer, died in an accident, leaving his wife, Luanne, behind...  A small hand reaches out to comfort the despair-stricken Luanne. Her young yet wise firstborn son, Chase, is not actually Jeff's son. He's the son of Alek, Prince of Carpathia, the only man Luanne ever loved. But Alek cruelly abandoned Luanne, and since then she's been nursing her resentment and stifling her irrepressible love for him. Now Alek has suddenly appeared before her—he wants to take his son and make him the heir to the throne!

Tae-chan is usually quiet but she won't have any pity for those who dare hurt Koro-chan...

He was an elite from the big city who had status, money, and women. However, when an investment in a share-house fails, he loses everything! At his lowest point of despair, he meets Tao, a brazen, young gay man who runs a share-house. "If you pretend to be a couple with me, I can help you." To take back his elite life and lost pride, as well as gain the know-how of running a share-house, he has to accept Tao's insane conditions!?

Mizuho is living on the edge of poverty in a 4.5 tatami mat room (7.5 square meters) due to his family's debt. One day he collapsed from hunger and is carried home by his unruly coworker Yae-san. Is the willful Yae truly what he appears to be?

2) Sweet Prisoner
A misunderstanding leads to S&M.

3) Sweet Worker
A coworker takes an interest in Mizuho.

4) Sweet Memories
Mizuho's old apartment is being torn down.

5) Northmen
Takes place in the time of the Vikings.

Customers come to the Cafe April with all sorts of issues. The owner, Miharu, brews to please, sometimes offering pleasure, other times comfort, and other times a first experience. In a part of town where passion and desire swirl about, he's tired of waiting for real love to show up. Hyogo Kijima's compilation offers a great touch of titillation.

(Source: Renta!)

synopsis:

(Source: ErogeShop)

title: Boku wo Suki ni Natte Kudasai

alternative_titles.ja: 僕をスキになってください

synopsis:
A 30-year-old man is fangirling over his favorite idol, and then sees her on the train. Like a stalker, he follows her home and waits outside her place, but he was caught by her manager. He started crying because he didn't realize he was scaring her, which made the manager feel bad for him. The manager strikes a deal with him: he wont take him to the police if he sleeps with him.

(Source: Mangago, edited)

Included one-shots: Atama no Okashii Sex, Suana no Naka no Yamaarashi, Overheat

When finally, she got into a design company with the invitation of a gorgeous male model and started making her own brand, what fate awaits her?

synopsis:
Year 20xx. In a high-tech future, where people are divided into categories according to their birthstone, there are two important things: "BOX," the immense virtual reality that manages the data of the world population, and "Logiste," a fierce dance competition, sometimes even dangerous, whose champions are considered real stars. To Kokoro Koyomi however, all this is precluded because of her strict father, who forbids her to even talk about it. One day, she secretly gains access to BOX, but remains stuck in the virtual reality because of a bug.

(Source: MU)

title: Tenshi no Shippo
synopsis:
A girl and a handsome young man fight against a sinister criminal.

title: Haitoku no Kiss
synopsis:
Demetri Kastro has dark suspicions about Joanna, the young and very attractive woman who has escorted his father home to Greece. Though the elderly millionaire is ill, Demetri is certain Joanna isn't what the doctor ordered!

However, Demetri's attempts to dig beneath Joanna's coolly beautiful exterior reveal few clues as to the nature of her relationship with his father. She's giving nothing away... except an unwitting sexual attractiveness that Demetri finds hard to resist...

(Source: MU)

title: Shichinin no Online Gamers: Offline

alternative_titles.ja: 七人のオンラインゲーマーズ～オフライン～

synopsis:
The protagonist Hideo, begins to play an online game, Seven Warriors Online, as a fencer called tetuONE. There, he meets a cleric called MONNBRUN. After they've played together for a while, MONNBRUN suggests they meet up in person and see a movie together. To Hideo's surprise, MONNBRUN is played by Kohane, a girl in his class.

Hideo meets others in SWO, including NEEV, who's player is a model named Yuniko, Sundome, whose player is Kohane's best friend, Anko, and TETUKO, whose player is Renka, a voice actress. Together they have fun and support one another, both in the game and in the real world, as they deal with the Player Killer called Chimera in SWO, and their own individual troubles and ambitions.

(Source: VNDB)

title: Sister Yuno no Tokimeki Shinkon Taiken

title: Dear Wolf
synopsis: Rina is a dog-hater. What will happen when the guy she falls in love is a werewolf!? (Source: Wingtip Cafe)

title: Totsuzen... Kekkon!
synopsis:
Millionaire bachelor Grant O'Hara thought the pretend marriage ceremony was just another Mardi Gras festivity until he and Cheyenne Tarantino were pronounced legally wed. Grant wasn't ready to settle down, and he'd only just met his wife. But, since nothing could be done until morning, Grant saw no reason not to play honeymoon with his shy, beautiful bride.

But Cheyenne sure did. She'd long ago vowed to save herself for her real wedding night. Still, Grant's thoughtfulness and irresistible charm were wearing her down. And soon, Cheyenne was wondering how she could turn their one-night marriage into forever....

title: Tamayura no Hibi
synopsis:
Izumi is Micchan's adopted nephew, who he helped raise from the time he was small, after Izumi's mom died, and then as well after his dad died. Izumi always was possessive of Micchan's attention, even when he was young. 

Izumi grew up and went to college and then eventually, at 20, he moves back home with Micchan. He surprise kisses Micchan and tells him he came home to become Micchan's lover!?

Despite his kiss attack, however, Izumi is respectful of Micchan's feelings of surprise and hesitation to enter into a relationship with a child he helped raise, who has now become a young man. They both try to be respectful of each other's feelings as they navigate their new dynamic and Micchan struggles with coming to terms with the new way he is coming to see Izumi.

(Source: MU)

title: Cheat Majutsu de Unmei wo Nejifuseru

synonyms: Twisting the Arm of Fate with Cheat Magic!!

synopsis:
Summoned from a different world, Souji was the strongest magician. This is because all the magic theory that he developed in-game became "real." Furthermore, Souji knew the "events" that were going to happen from now on. This world is moving according to the history in the game.

Souji rescues many beautiful heroines from their miserable fate one after another. As their beauty and abilities aren't inferior, they became Souji's "comrades." The strongest magic theory, and the strongest bishoujo party. Souji which has all the elements to become the strongest marches forward!

This is the tale of him rising to the strongest transcendence!

(Source: Nepustation)

But the affair is discovered and Senou is fired. Now he's just drifting through life, until he meets Shuuichi again...

Coming from a broken family, and scarred from years of mental abuse from her own grandmother, Dahn Kang resolves to get through high school quietly. But in walks Sunjae who seems deep and sensitive and Jiwoo who loves to flirt. Dahn suddenly finds her quiet existence a far off memory.

Takanori is in shocked after seeing Akikawa messing around with the chemistry sensei. At the same time, Mioki confesses to him. What should he do now? Will he accept Mioki or confess to Akikawa? Includes 3 other one-shots of a school director and a students, and between friends.

title: Gal♂Chin
synopsis:
Everyone likes to relax and do something they enjoy. But when it comes to a certain young man who has a unique fascination with gyarus, rather than long walks on the beach, he likes to walk around a shopping district while cross-dressed as a gyaru. There he enjoys being the center of attention, as well as the occasional flirting from people unaware of his true gender. 
 
Worked up and ready to "let go," he usually heads for a particular public lavatory that no one uses. This time, however, he discovers another cross-dressing gyaru masturbating in one of the stalls. Angry at first about the other person's intrusion into his special place, he soon finds himself unable to tear his eyes away from the intruder who seems to be enjoying himself more and more with each passing second.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Angel Beats! Original Comics
synopsis: A CD comic consisting of two short stories: Last Song and the 4-Koma.

title: Kokushi no Shima
synopsis: A few days ago, non-fiction writer Katsuragi Shiho came to see Shikibu Takeru at his office in Tokyo. She gave him the key to his apartment and asked him to take care of her things if she did not return from her trip in 3 days. Unfortunately, she did not return in 3 days, nor in 4. Even more mysteriously, nobody seemed to know where she had even gone. Worried, Takeru dug deeper and eventually found 2 witnesses that said they saw Shiho and another woman who looked her age ride the ferry to "Island Kokushi" near Kumamoto. Takeru sets off to try to find her there, but what awaits him is a strange island where nothing is what it seems. In a place haunted with old tradition, a strange religion, and several mysterious deaths, can Takeru find what really happened to his friend?

title: Yomotsu Hirasaka Residence

alternative_titles.ja: 黄泉比良坂レジデンス

synopsis:
In the midst of job hunting, Chimaki, who has been rejected by 100 companies, and other two girls visit an amusement park. There, they are mysteriously absorbed by an unknown gate... and appear in a residential tower in Hell, inhabited by demons! The three friends become the maids of the tower, and the only way to come back to life is to climb floor by floor to the top of the mansion by earning the trust of the residents. Maids, work! Earn! Rise to the top! Work hard until the day you achieve Resurrection!

(Source: Shueisha, translated)

title: Sobo no Kami wo Kitta Hi
synopsis:
Shikabane never knew his mother. Abandoned by his father, he lived alongside his grandmother as a child in poverty. But thanks to the kindness of the latter, despite a difficult daily life and the blessings of his comrades, he managed to grow and build himself. As an adult, he finally believed he could enjoy life. Unfortunately, when his grandmother seems to show signs of senile dementia, Shikabane loses his footing and doesn't know how to react...

(Source: Akata, translated)

title: Utagawareta Hanayome
synopsis:
How can this waitress regret having become the king’s bride?

Lucy never thought that covering for a coworker would change her life, but that night she would meet Rafi, a wealthy prince from a small country near the Ural Mountains. From the moment they met, Lucy knew Rafi was the man for her. Before long Lucy was pregnant, and Rafi, intending to do the right thing, took her to his home country to marry her. But soon after their marriage, everything changed—Rafi became as cold as ice. Trapped in a loveless marriage in a country where she doesn’t know the language or the customs, Lucy is unsure what to do. Will things get better for her, or will she be forever stuck in a cold, loveless marriage? 

(Soruce: M-U)

alternative_titles.ja: 藤元杏はご機嫌ななめ

title: Surround
synopsis:
Yamaguchi. Toda. Tajima. Three high school boys. "Buddies" isn't quite what to call them, it's more natural than that. Take some time to relax, and read this easy-going story. Each day isn't just glimmering, but radiant.

(Source: Leed-sha, translated)

Following a certain person "committing suicide to protect the present age," circumstances like those that happen in the World of Fate/Grand Order do not occur. Although the result was unknown to everyone, his actions protected both the past and future in that worldline.

(Source: Type-Moon wiki)

title: ブルーピリオド 小説

alternative_titles.ja: ブルーピリオド 小説

synopsis: Yatora Yaguchi, a second-year high school student, is bored with her normal life. He studies well and plays with his friends, but he doesn't really enjoy any of these activities. Bound by the rules, he secretly envies those who do things differently. Until he discovers the pleasure of drawing. When he sees a painting made by a member of the Art Club, Yatora is fascinated by the colors used in it. Later, in an art exercise, he tries to convey his language without words, but through painting. After that experience, Yatora is so drawn to art that he decides what he wants to do for a living. But multiple obstacles stand in his way: his parents, who doubt his unique choices, his more experienced classmates and the study of a subject much deeper than he initially expected.

title: Hyper Genius
synopsis:
1) To the Sea
While his parents are away, Yutaka is to be watched over by the strict Naruhiko. The only plus is the mysterious beauty Yutaka meets at the swimshore, who is somehow familiar to him. And what is the connection between this beautiful swimmer and the cold Naruhiko...?

2) I'm Not Your Mama
Shou is outwardly the tough leader of a school gang, but at home he acts the part of mother to his two younger brothers. One day David, the leader of a rival gang, finds out the hidden side of Shou as well as a certain embarrassing secret. David claims he has feelings for Shou and that his secret is safe, but can Shou really trust him?  (From: B-U)

Rei is a president of student council–he is always so cool and well-mannered, impressing everyone with a perfect attendance record. One day, Shindo, a transfer student with outstanding grades, comes to school and starts to have a crush on him. During the semester, Shindo begins making moves on Rei, and really begins to falls in love with him. Shindo is outgoing and sociable. Rei is reserved and a bit snobbish. A perfect scenario of opposites attracts...or do they?

(Source: June Manga)

title: Uso Yomi to Gishoku no Oujo
synopsis:

alternative_titles.en: Nice Day for a little mermaid

(Source: MU)

title: Imouto de Ikou!
synopsis:
When her family is overthrown in a coup d'état, Princess Mayuka is sent to Earth to recharge the Ultimate Weapon. After studying the mating behaviors of Earthlings, she decides to enlist the help of one of her research subjects, college student Yoshizumi, but crash-lands on his roof. Taken hostage and shot with her own gun by Yoshizumi, she is brainwashed into thinking she is his younger sister. Fortunately, Yoshizumi grows fond of Mayuka and decides to help her with her mission: to awaken the powers of Akiho--the red-haired, green-eyed, appetite-driven Ultimate Weapon--using "primitive stimulation".

(Source: ANN)

Tarou is sent to the forest alone. He's a sacrifice for the monstrous wolf, Uru. Upon seeing him, Uru declares Tarou too small and too thin. The wolf feeds him, clothes him, and cares for him. Time passes and Tarou finds himself wanting to be devoured by this giant wolf who gives him nothing but affection.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

In an unexpected turn of events, he gets to know this Izumi, so he starts following him around to prevent people from mistaking them...

To earn one of the spots in the competition, the Dotsuitare Honpo crew—Sasara Nurude, Rosho Tsutsujimori, and Rei Amayado—must survive the preliminary matches first. However, such is easier said than done, as Rosho's stage fright makes him question his usefulness to the team.

Meanwhile, Bad Ass Temple starts gearing up for the preliminaries, but each member is struggling with their own issues. For group leader Kuko Harai, a quarrel with his father causes him to doubt his ability to lead his team to victory; one of Jyushi Aimono's bullies returns from his brief stint in juvenile detention, thirsty for revenge; and Hitoya Amaguni's recent blunder in the courtroom raises the concern that he is unable to separate his personal and professional lives.

In a race against the clock, the two teams must face and resolve their difficulties to stand a chance at claiming glory.

The experiment of Doctor Kobayakawa ends in a disappointing failure, yet the elder brother of a young Akio makes the acquaintance of the Doctor, unmistakably a trap, one bearing the danger of a new experiment...

title: Kamigami no Itadaki
synopsis:
In 1924, mountaineers George Mallory and Andrew Irvine attempted a daring challenge: to be the first to scale Mount Everest. However, they disappeared during the final stages of their trek, leading to one of mountaineering's greatest mysteries—did the pair ever make it to the summit?

1993, Kathmandu. Japanese photographer Makoto Fukamichi discovers a vintage camera in an antique store, which he believes might have belonged to Mallory. However, the camera falls into the possession of "Bikha Sanp", a burly Japanese man who Fukamichi realizes may very well be Jouji Habu, a legendary Japanese mountaineer who disappeared from the scene several years ago. Unfortunately for Fukamichi however, Bikha Sanp refuses to talk to him and leaves with the camera in tow.

With the trail gone cold, Fukamichi has only one course left to pursue: to delve into Habu's past, and see just what may have brought the former climber to Nepal. For the sake of rewriting mountaineering history, Fukamichi begins his investigation, a task that will bring him to the greatest height in the world—the summit of the gods.

Ever since he was a child, Tachibana Hideo has wanted to become a superhero like in the TV shows he watched. After he graduated from high school, he got into the Kantou Films School to chase this dream. In the summer beforehand, he managed to get a part-time job as a costumed villain for a "Crashman" heroes live show. Unfortunately, he got a little too into it, kicked the heroic "Crash Pink" in the face, and got himself fired. As he later discovered, Crash Pink was his future classmate and aspiring actress, Mutou Sakurako! Livid that he'd dare damage her precious face, she insisted that he make up for the injury, mostly by putting up with her constant efforts to torment him. But as they spend time together, could something much sweeter than mutual annoyance be growing between them?

However, the housewife gets lost before her appointment and ends up meeting professor Hayao Nuregashira, a researcher of sexual activity and behavior. He mistakes Ayako for an experiment participant and subjects her to a series of erotic tests, soon finding out just how lustful she really is.
 
Impressed by her limitless libido and appeal, the professor appoints Ayako as head researcher of various sexual topics. With the carnal satisfaction she desires now available at every turn, Ayako eagerly carries out her new tasks. But unbeknownst to her, this new job may lead to something worth more than mere sexual appeasement.

title: Ichinose-kun wa Itsumo Iinari.

alternative_titles.ja: 一ノ瀬くんはいつも言いなり。

synopsis:
The Ichinose family has served to protect the Saionji family since long ago. Until now, Kimihito Saionji and Takeru Ichinose have been glued at the hip as master and servant. Kimihito's haughty personality is an eyesore to his classmates. Still, as a master, he has to put on airs, no matter how much he wants to openly admire Takeru's coolness as well.

On the other hand, Takeru doesn't mind being ordered around at all. In truth, his master is quite naive and helpless without a servant—and Takeru fully intends to keep it that way. He can abide by whatever command if it means having this unique side of Kimihito all to himself.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Heat Guy J
synopsis:
Daisuke Aurora works with the special division of peacekeepers in the city of Jewde, one of the largest cities on the planet. He and his android partner, Heat Guy J, team up to make sure that anything illegal stays off the streets and out of circulation.

However, their presence doesn't sit too well with the local mob leader—a ruthless, unbalanced, well-armed son of the late Don, who is out to prove that he is not too young to take over the family business. In the city that never sleeps, will Daisuke and Heat Guy J end up sleeping with the fishes?

(Source: TokyoPop)

title: Boku to Kanojo no Meguru Isekai

alternative_titles.ja: 僕と彼女の転生〈めぐ〉る異世界

title: Dekiru Otoko
synopsis:
Sagishima Takehiko, Hokuto's distant benefactor throughout his growing up with foster parents, is a successful executive. When Hokuto turns 20, he appears in his life in person and turns it upside down in order to groom Hakuto as his successor. But is that all he is, a benefactor? Hokuto wonders whether he might not have a secret reason for his kindness to a supposed stranger. But when he finally gets to ask the question he has pondered all his life, the way Sagishima responds is ... surprising.
(from B-U)

title: Hatsujou Porno Star
synopsis:
Popular adult film star tops Daiki and Sogo can't stand each other! Even so, the two are thrown together in an upcoming feature! They're tricked by a cunning director into taking a role where one will need to be the bottom. First, they'll have to learn to get along, and to make sure they do, they've been handcuffed together and forced to stay that way for one week! They'll have to shower and use the bathroom together...and what's more, nothing's stopping them from taking on other scenes...!!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Genjuu Jiten

alternative_titles.en: Tales of the Prehistoric Animal Kingdom

synopsis:
The ancient earth. Many animals were born and killed in the overwhelming nature. They are the ancestors of the animals that now live on this planet.

(Source: Futabasha, translated)

title: Tsuihou Akuyaku Reijou no Dannasama

alternative_titles.ja: 追放悪役令嬢の旦那様

synopsis:
"I" had the luck of being the one who reached out towards the young lady whose engagement was annulled by Prince Alephaldo, Elana. The day after the annulment, I was banished with her and married even though we dated for exactly 0 days. Well, it's just a slow country lifestyle of banishment in the neighboring country! Or so I thought, but...? This is my story about becoming a banished villainess's husband.

(Source: Hakusensha, translated)

title: Yggdra Silver
synopsis:
Wrapped in snow and ice, a country of severe winter. In the country that has lost its spring, the populace freeze, starve, and compete amongst themselves for rations to live another day. When a girl who hides in herself an earnest desire and an old knight that is wanted by the country meet in a hellish world, an adventure that will overturn the world begins. With the kingdom as their enemy, they will take back everything that was stolen.

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Kiki
synopsis:
Chapter 3 – Picnic part 2 (continued from ch2) - Despite everything, Kaname seems to have found a bit of happiness with Kenichirou. But Kaname’s father doesn’t want to let Kaname go and is doing everything he can to keep them apart.

Chapter 4 – In God’s Hands - Masato used to be a delinquent that was so naughty he was called the "Legendary evil." However, he has reformed because of his love for Jouji, a priest. But pretty rich boy Kikunosuke has his eyes set on Jouji as well and isn’t about to let Masato have him!

Chapter 5 – Dark Gray Heaven, Rainbow-colored Paradise - Kotegawa Hajime has an automata made that is a perfect replica of himself, and plans to have this automata take his place as heir to his father’s company. Unfortunately, just after telling his father’s secretary about his plan, Hajime loses his memories in an accident. Now no one, including Hajime himself, is quite sure which is the real Hajime and which is the automata.

(Source: B-U)

alternative_titles.ja: カテキョー・ブレイクタイム

title: Moshimo Kubiwa ga Hazuseta Nareba

synonyms: If I Could Take This Collar Off!
alternative_titles.en: If I Could Take My Collar Off
alternative_titles.ja: もしも首輪がはずせたならば

synopsis:
"I bought an old slave with one coin (and got change back)." Tanya, a lonely girl, buys a slave, William, for one coin. Tanya wants to be family, but they're "master" and "slave." It's the incongruously woven daily life of two people with different ages and social standings.

(Source: Comic Polaris, translated)

title: Ryokuou no Tate to Mafuyu no Kuni

alternative_titles.en: The Shield of the Green King and the Country in Eternal Winter

title: Naka Secha Ooka
synopsis:
Hiyoko's childhood friend, Bambi, had an idiosyncrasy as a child--his ears would grow like horns when he got frustrated! Moreover, he used to only bully Hiyoko. One day, unexpectedly he appears as a transfer student at Hiyoko's school, and...!

(Source: Infinity Scans)

title: Kamisama Onegai!
synopsis:
Life was a mundane chore for student council member Hasumi Ryou, until he picked up a charm on the floor. Suddenly a junior high-school student with bad grades appears in his room calling him Kami-sama and asks for help to pass her high school entrance exam. Not to mention that it doesn't make sense that his room changes into hers everyday after school, Ryou abandons all logic and decides to go with the flow, his heart touched by the earnest desire of the girl who wants to graduate to high school. 

(Source: Shoujo Crusade)

title: Hana to Konjou: Boudai Danshi ni Koishimashita.

alternative_titles.ja: 花と紺青 防大男子に恋しました。

synopsis:
Hazuki is your normal high school girl who just started working part-time at a flower shop. There, she falls in love at first sight with the gentle and manly Ryo in his National Defense Academy (Boudai) uniform. However, Hazuki, being inexperienced with love and also in awe of Ryo's Boudai uniform, has mistaken her feelings as a sign of her uniform fetish instead.

Bouei Daigakkou (The National Defense Academy of Japan) is known for being the strictest academy in Japan where future leaders of the Japanese Self-Defense Force attend. With many restrictions such as no sharing an umbrella and of course no holding hands, love with a Boudai boy is filled with many unique hurdles! What will be the outcome of Hazuki and Ryo's super pure love story?

(Source: Kodansha, translated)

title: Hitomi no Mukougawa
synopsis:
In high school I, Hayami Ren, was reunited with my childhood friend, Hikawa Yukito. I’ve always been charmed by him. However, Yuki-chan has become too involved in his Kendo club and is even being labeled as the “Hope” of the club. Now, I feel more and more like I have been cast aside. But I love him, so I want to be with him and become his equal. Struggling between love and dreams, what would be our fate being that we’re such a clumsy couple…?

(Source: Fantasy Shrine)

title: Nee, Onnanoko ni Shite Ageru

alternative_titles.en: Hey, You Wanna Be a Real Girl?
alternative_titles.ja: ねえ、おんなのこにしてあげる

synopsis:
Shiro Manabe, who's busy working as the manager of a travel agency, relieves the stress from his daily life by working at a cross-dressing club for just three hours on Saturday nights as "Mashiro." One day, the high-spec, sarcastic subordinate who's always looking down on him, Kuro Nabatame, visits the store by chance...?! His stress-relieving hobby of crossdressing was discovered! What will he have to do in order to keep his secret?!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

title: Romantic Blue Ice

alternative_titles.ja: ロマンチック・ブルーアイズ

synopsis:
From Baka-Updates

4 short stories:

1. Romantic Blue Ice - Her birthday is on Christmas and she should be out celebrating, however, she was ditched by her friends and then she got hit by a car! When she regains consciousness, she realizes that she is transported to a pure white world with the man who rescued her!? A Christmas Fantasy.

2. Pink Beast

3. In a Clear Day at this Place

4. 7x7

alternative_titles.ja: 淑女のひめごと~オンナたちの都市伝説~

title: Elio and Yvette
synopsis: A real Romeo and Juliet love story. Two opposing Mafia bosses children, Elio and Yvette are in love, but the twist to the story is Yvette's brother is also in love with her!

title: Sugar to Mustard

alternative_titles.ja: シュガーとマスタード

synopsis:
It's a world where S and M matches get systematically created. Office worker Masachika (M) is introduced to the younger university student, Seiji (S). Masachika intended on taking the lead, but he was led around by Seiji's unexpected S techniques, and made to come relentlessly! With their physical compatibility being perfect, and their natural transition into living together, Masachika plans to coach Seiji into becoming his type.

However, the gap between Seiji's kindness and his relentless attacks makes Masachika's heart skip a beat?!

(Source: Frontier Works, translated)

title: Shin no Nakama Episode.0: Imadake Saikyou no Souryuu Kishi wa, Izure Musou no Imouto Yuusha wo Mamori Nuku

alternative_titles.ja: 真の仲間Episode.0 今だけ最強の走竜騎士は、いずれ無双の妹勇者を守り抜く

title: Paradise Town
synopsis: Welcome to Ichi-choume Paradise Town, a.k.a. Mother-in-Law Inferno! The plot of this achingly simple manga revolves around a woman (presumably named Noriko) trying to kill her mother-in-law, who is bed-ridden. Throughout, they maintain the utmost politeness while speaking to each other. (Source: Cheap Manga)

title: Age!
synopsis:
Age! tells the story of Takano Eiji, a tennis player who was unable to defeat Saki at the finals of the regional championships the previous year. His problem? He doesn't know how to hit any spin and grows incredibly violent when he loses a match. Read this manga for a great combination of humor and sports. Think Prince of Tennis except much much funnier. 
(Source: We Hate Manga)

title: One Room ni Shitsuji.
synopsis:
A beautiful man suddenly turns up at Satori's run-down apartment, saying, "I am Saizo Kusunoki, your butler." In truth, Satori is descended from a super rich family. As a young child, though, he began to show signs of social withdrawal as a result of constant stress, so his mother, who was opposed to her family's privileged mindset, left home along with Satori and his father. The three of them lived a humble but happy life... And now, after his parents' sudden death, Satori lives as a poor student who spends all of his time working. Enter the butler. He is from the main family and informs Satori of the recent death of his grandfather along with the will which names Satori as the next family head... Satori receives daily training on how to purport himself from this handsome, older, aristocratic, slightly sadistic butler. Kusunoki calls it his "duty," and soon starts to train Satori's body, too!

(Source: Renta!)

title: Sessa Takuma!
synopsis:
Takuma Ban, only son of the Ban familly from Hokkaido, comes to Tokyo on a quest: to find a fitting wife... with the help of Meari his cow. Jumping over a school fence while carrying Meari on his back, he unexpectedly meets a girl, Yuki Samejima. After one minute, he decides that SHE'll be his bride. Unfortunately for Takuma, Yuki's older brother, Ranmaru Samejima, is completely opposed to this.

Of course, the fact that Meari seems to have developed an instant "animal" attraction to him only reinforces Ranmaru's dislike of Takuma. Takuma is determined to make Yuki his bride and that, despite Ranmaru's stern "objections". Nevertheless, when not only Kei Enjouji but also Takuma's own family start getting involved, things get a little … "chaotic". 

(Source: Essence of Purity)

alternative_titles.ja: カイリキーのかいりき警察24時!!

title: Yurayura Q
synopsis: The story of Kyuuko, a high school girl who also happens to be part kitsune.

synonyms: Welcome to the Residence with Glory Holes
alternative_titles.ja: 壁穴付住居へようこそ

title: Aisare Seijo wa Yamiochi Akayuku wo Sukuitai

synonyms: Aisare Seijo Heroine ni Tensei shitara Onnatarashi datta Hazu no Kouryaku Taishou ni Mechakucha Osareteru n desu kedo!?
alternative_titles.en: The Saint, Loved by All, Wants to Save the Villain Who Falls to the Dark.
alternative_titles.ja: 愛され聖女は闇堕ち悪役を救いたい

synopsis:
Due to her lack of magical powers, the count's daughter Sufia has been trapped in her house from a young age. Upon her father's remarriage, she sees her new stepmother and stepsister. From this comes a revelation: she has been reincarnated in an otome game. According to the storyline, Sufia will suffer under the thumb of her stepsister, Lily... But with her positivity and composure, Sufia is unmoved!

Furthermore, in order to save her favorite character, Evuard, who is bound to fall into evil, Sufia begins manipulating her sister from behind the scenes. Sufia succeeds in preventing his downfall. After using her knowledge of the game, Sufia acquires the title of "saint" and enrolls in the magic academy! No matter what, she resolves to save the other characters as well!

Thereupon, perplexed by Sufia's actions, Evuard begins showing an interest in her...? This is the story of an overwhelmingly positive heroine seizing her own happiness!

(Source: Overlap, translated)

title: DTC: Yukemuri Junjou-hen from High & Low
Suki to Itte
synopsis:
After being dumped by his girlfriend, Iijima (a tutor) is confessed to by his shy student Daisuke. The incident takes Iijima by surprise... and it also makes him realize that he's gay. But the 5-year age difference and his position as Daisuke's tutor makes Iijima reluctant to accept Daisuke's confession. However, Daisuke doesn't care about their differences and, despite his shyness, is determined to win Iijima over.

(from M-U)

alternative_titles.ja: パラダイム・パラサイト

title: Himitsu no Asa ni wa Kiss no Ame

synonyms: Rain of Kiss in the Morning of Secrets
alternative_titles.ja: ひみつの朝にはキスの雨

title: Sasabunechou Konjaku
synopsis:
The local gods are out of followers, and only have one yokai to give them power! Can Mizuchi, the yokai, bring any more into the fold?
(from Storm in Heaven)

title: Boku wa Make Shite Miru Koto ni Shita

alternative_titles.ja: 僕はメイクしてみることにした

synopsis:
Ichirou Maeda is a 38-year-old, single office worker. One day, Ichirou was shocked to see his exhausted face and sagging body, and decided to start make up! Looking up to Tama-chan, a girl who loves cosmetics that he met at a pharmacy as a "master," he learns about the importance of working for himself and the joy of makeup while making mistakes along the way.

(Source: MU)

alternative_titles.ja: 冷めないふたりのひとりご飯
キャラメル バター ロリポップ

title: Hoshi no Hayasa de Kaketeku
synopsis:
A collection of one-shots by Tanikawa Fumiko.  

Hoshi no Hayasa de Kaketeku:
Shinobu and Kanta are childhood friends and a couple off to college in Hokkaido in the fall.  But a chance encounter with someone who reminds Shinobu of another childhood friend, Kyuu, who passed away a year ago begins to change things slowly...

Hoshi no Kakurega:
Muraji likes Gotou-kun, but Gotou-kun is already taken.  Wishing otherwise on a star is harmless, though, right?  

Cocoa Break:
Hagiko works at a library and always sees a high school couple studying together there, but one day, the girl stops showing up.  As she wonders what happened, the young girl suddenly appears in front of her again, but this time in Hagiko's apartment?

title: City in the Sea
synopsis: A girl living alone in a city that sank into the sea.

title: Niji no Tani no Anne
synopsis:
The eternal lovers Anne and Gilbert are now married. Gilbert, now a doctor and Anne, now Mrs. Blythe were blessed with six children; all of them live in an old village on Prince Edward Island. Near Ingleside, where the family lives, there is a little beautiful valley, called Rainbow valley that the children love more than any other place in the world. As the four children of the new minister Mr. Meredith become good playmates of the Ingleside children, the valley turns more into a more and more lively place. But one day, from a strange reason, a girl called Mary appears looking for shelter…

(Source: Meisaku Translations)

title: Hadouken: Prelude to Battle
synopsis: A story by Kiyoshi Utata published in Gamest #13 from 1987, around the time the original Street Fighter was released, about Ryu seeking to avenge the death of his master at the hands of Sagat. Notably for introducing his master's daughter, a character seldom seen since.

title: Tenningo
synopsis:
Akesagi is a princess so strong that others refer to her as "Onihime"
Her brother, in contrast, is sickly and weak - but he is the one set to be their father's heir until their castle is crushed following the betrayal of one of Akesagi's companions. 
All at once, everything changes - her parents are killed, her brother is seriously wounded, and Akesagi finds herself nurturing the flames of revenge in her heart as she is forced into hiding.
Then, in the forests, she meets the mysterious boy Hahoya...
(Source: Ephidel, based on the summary at the nekohigesensei blog).

synonyms: story about a boy and a girl who travel to a world where time has stopped

synopsis: story about a boy and a girl who travel to a world where time has stopped

7-13. Houkago xxx Kenkyuu-bu

title: Hitomi no Photograph
synopsis: Aihara Haruka moved to a small town in the middle of the second year in high school.  Far from all the life she had in big cities, she wanted to start a blog. For content, she started taking pictures of the place in her daily life, but find it difficult.  A girl gave her advice, and Haruka got invited to the photography club soon after. At first, she can’t say that she’s only taking pictures for her blog, but with them, she starts to realize the fun of doing photography and learns more about it.

title: Zenin Ore no Solo Party: Betsusekai no Oretachi wo Shoukan shite Musou suru

synonyms: Everyone in My Solo Party: Summon Us from Another World and Be Unmatch
alternative_titles.ja: 全員俺のソロパーティー～別世界の俺たちを召喚して無双する～

synopsis:
The story of an adventurer Esto who is looking for his teammates to explore the world. However, his skill "solo" changed everything.

(Source: MangaDex)

title: Tokkou Zero
synopsis:
"Tokkou" is the nickname of the Special Public Safety Department in the Second Division of the Special Tactical Police Force Metropolitan Police Department.

This special force was established to deal with acts of indiscriminate murder and terrorism, which occur frequently nowadays, as well as unusual crimes with unknown causes. This team is made up of specialists who work to apprehend strange creatures, or "freaks," known as "phantoms."

title: Shikibu I Love You
synopsis: "The Pillow Book is a fashionably crappy diary, and I can't write stories about happy couples." Murasaki Shikibu writes "The Tale of Genji" with the sleeves of her twelve-layered ceremonial kimono rolled up, her hem in disarray, and her hair swinging wildly. With no interest in money or honor, what is the purpose of Shikibu's perseverance? And what is the unknown model of Hikaru Genji?! A slapstick Heian comedy is about to begin!

title: Super Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

synonyms: 超てんちゃん！ NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE公式アンソロジー
OMGkawaiiAngel! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

Internet Angel descends into the manga world!!!
The first official anthology comic of the popular game "NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE"!

alternative_titles.en: Is it A Sin to Turn a Blind Eye?
alternative_titles.ja: 見て見ぬふりは、罪ですか?

synopsis:
A collection of 11 short stories.

title: Suizou ga Kowaretara, Sukoshi Iki Yasuku Narimashita.

synonyms: My Broken Pancreas Made My Life a Little Bit Easier
alternative_titles.en: My Pancreas Broke, but My Life Got Better
alternative_titles.ja: 膵臓がこわれたら、少し生きやすくなりました。

synopsis:
In this new autobiographical manga following My Wandering Warrior Existence, Kabi Nagata has quit drinking in an attempt to get healthier—or she's trying to, anyway. Her former struggles with alcohol led to pancreatitis and a serious hospitalization, and now she has no choice but to give it up. Follow the author as she details the quest to improve her health during a global pandemic.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)

title: Spunk
synopsis:
Spunk follows Kana Kurita, a woman who has always freely pursued the things she likes and finds fun. Eventually, she becomes a lady of the night, and after meeting a yakuza head, she enters the world of S&M.

(Source: Natalie, translated)
